favourite.article: What a wonderful way to be the people who could minister and refresh our Lord, by simply calling on His name. Oh how much we need to give the Lord a way to head us up!

Having enjoyed this spiritual song since it was first released and being acquainted with quite a few hymns that we sing in the Lord's recovery, I can say that this is one of the most beautiful songs we sing. I hope sing this "before the throne" as part of the "new song."
Wow this song is so true.
I like the chorus..."We can call O Lord, We can praise Your name, Turn our heart to You, Let You rule and reign. Lord, a single heart that’s true, That’s what we desire— A heart for You".
We can call O Lord, we can praise Your name, turn our hearts to You, let You rule and reign. Lord, a single heart that's true, that is what we desire, a heart for You.
What a precious hymn; how it stirs our hearts! Thank you.

So grant us all a single heart; A heart that just loves You A heart that's true
I really like these lines. Dear Lord Jesus, do grant us such a heart.

:( Music? I don't know how to sing these wonderful lyrics...
I like how it says "we can call O Lord, we can praise Your name". The word in spanish used for "can" (poder) is the same word for "power", so another way to look at those lines is "we have the power to call O Lord! we have the power, we are able, to praise Your name!"
Call O Lord and praise His name saints!
